title: PLAYERS SHOULD NOT LOSE LP FOR AFK!
body:
There is NO FUCKIN REASON TO LOSE LP FOR AN AFKER 5-15 Mins of the round.

WHY THE FUCK AM I losing 15+ LP for somebody's connection?

Fuckin FIX THIS FUCKIN GARBAGE!

HOLY.

At least we have a reroll first 3 mins. Cool. Thanks.

SOLUTION: **System detects an AFKer after 5 minutes, Automatically starts - VOTE REROLL -
Team accepts. GG. AFKer loses 30 LP.**
